I have news about your conferencing service
YOUR ONE SOURCE
FOR ALL THE WAYS YOU NEED TO MEET
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
As your PGi account manager, I want to introduce you to all the services that we currently provide your company, and share useful information like:
- How to get the most out of your audio conferencing service and take advantage of all the features available with your account - Which web and video conferencing options are available for you to use when you need to really engage your participants - Who to contact if you need a PGi Event Specialist to set-up and host a large meeting, event or webcast - Where you can find online resources for training & support Do you have 15 minutes?
I'd like to learn more about your needs so I can recommend some specific solutions. I will call to get some time on your calendar and you are welcome to contact me at your convenience.
Regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
